thread.title: Motorola launches Moto X Play in India, priced at Rs 18,499
thread.title_full: Motorola launches Moto X Play in India, priced at Rs 18,499 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Motorola launches Moto X Play in India, priced at Rs 18,499
text:
Other Articles Motorola sells 2.6 mn units in India in 7 months Skoda launches Octavia 'anniversary edition' at Rs 15.75 lakh Balco begins process to shut rolling business; 1,000 jobs to be lost
Motorola launched Moto X Play smartphone in India priced at Rs 18,499.
Motorola on Monday launched Moto X Play smartphone in India priced at Rs 18,499, which will go on sale on Flipkart from midnight tonight. The smartphone features a 21 megapixel camera and a 30 hour battery life promise.
The 32 GB version of the Moto X Play will price Rs 19,999. Motorola will sell the Turbo charger for the Moto X Play separately.
The Moto X Play is the cheaper and smaller screen version in the 2015 Moto X series. The smartphone comes with a 5.5-inch Full HD screen at 403 ppi with Gorilla Glass 3, Snapdragon 615 Octa-core CPU clocked at 1.7 GHz with Adreno 405 @ 550 MHz GPU. The Moto X Style, on the other hand, has a 5.7-inch Quad HD display at a resolution of 1440 x 2560 pixels.
The Moto X Play also has a Natural Language Processor, Contextual Computing Processor like the Moto X Style. The Moto X Play comes with 2GB RAM and 16 or 32GB storage space options (upto 128GB microSD card supported).
The battery in the Moto X Play is at 3630 mAh with 30 hours usage. The rear camera is 21 megapixel with a f /2.0 aperture and the front camera is 5 megapixel. The original Moto X was launched at a price of Rs 23,999, while the second Moto X launched in India for Rs 31,999 for the 16GB version and later a 32GB version was also launched at Rs 32,999.
Moto X Play Specs
Display: 5.5-inch 1080p Full HD, 403 ppi, Corning Gorilla Glass 3
Processor, GPU: 1.7GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 615 Octa-core CPU plus Natural Language Processor, Contextual Computing Processor| Adreno 405 @ 550 MHz GPU
RAM/Storage: 2GB RAM/ 16 or 32GB storage
Battery: 3630 mAh Mixed usage up to 48 hours
Camera: 21 MP, f /2.0 aperture with 1080 HD video recording, 5 MP front camera
Networks: GSM/GPRS/EDGE, UMTS/HSPA+, 4G LTE, 4G LTE bands supported 1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 19, 20, 28, 38, 41
Connectivity, Etc: Bluetooth version 4.0 LE, WiFi: 802.11a/g/b/n, NFC, Micro USB, 3.5mm headset jack
Dimensions: 5.8 inches Height, 2.9 inches Width, Curve: 0.35- 0.43 inche
Weight: 169 grams SIM: Dual Nano-SIM
Colours: Black with Black Back, White with Winter White Back
